commitMessage:
@@@Fix downloading pdf produces html as extension (#4965)

* Fix downloading pdf produces html as extension

If we already have a filetype we use that instead of relying on the autodetection


Fixes #4913

* add relativze if not an URL

* Create  Test for download pdf document
heavy mocking and refactoring of ExternalFileType

TODO : Cleanup

* refactor and simply test
fix cehckstyle
fail test on exception

@@@Merge pull request #5068 from JabRef/copyLinkedFilesInContextmenu

Add copy linked files action to contextmneu in general tab

@@@Refactor of remaining preference tabs to PreferencesService (#6836)

* Refactored NameFormatterTab to use PreferencesService

* Refactored XmpPreferencesTab

* Fixed missing storeNameFormatterPreferences

* Refactor PreviewPreferences to conventions and use PreferencesService

* Fixed not reloading PreviewPreferences

* Removed unused preference

* Introduced GroupsPreferences and refactored GroupsTabViewModel to use them

* Cleanups

* CHANGELOG.md

@@@Changed default value of "search and store files relative to bibtex file" to true (#6928)

* Fixes #6863

* CHANGELOG.md

* Reworded bibLocationAsPrimary to reflect real meaning of the preference setting.  changed default val to true

* Cleanup of deprecated methods LinkedFiles(String.  String.  String) and List<String> getFileDirectories(...)

* Reworded package filelist to linkedfile

* Fixed SpringerFetcher

@@@Implement an interface to import PDF metadata from multiple sources (XMP.  Grobid.  ...) (#7929)
